com.permissionnanny.lib.request.simple

Class LocationRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.permissionnanny.lib.request.PermissionRequest
      • com.permissionnanny.lib.request.simple.SimpleRequest
        • com.permissionnanny.lib.request.simple.LocationRequest

  • public class LocationRequest
extends SimpleRequest
    Factory that creates LocationManager requests.

        public void startRequest(android.content.Context context,
                         String reason)
        Description copied from class: PermissionRequest
        Start the request.
        Overrides:
        startRequest in class PermissionRequest
        Parameters:
        context - Activity, Service, etc.
        reason - Explain to the user why you need to access the resource. This is displayed to the user in a dialog when Permission Nanny needs to ask the user for authorization.
